meanings.definition: The act of putting liquid into bottles.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers were busy with the bottlings of the fresh juice.
meanings.sent2: The bottlings of the perfume were done carefully to avoid spillage.
meanings.sent3: The bottlings of the soda were so fast, it looked like a magic trick!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled out like the bottlings of a fizzy drink.
meanings.sent5: The bottlings of the honey were like capturing sunshine in a jar.

meanings.definition: Bottles of wine or other alcoholic beverages.
meanings.sent1: The cellar was filled with rare bottlings of aged wine.
meanings.sent2: He collected unique bottlings of whiskey from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The party was a hit with its variety of bottlings of spirits.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight danced on the sea like shimmering bottlings of champagne.
meanings.sent5: The bar displayed an impressive array of bottlings from local breweries.
